articles.title: Max Holloway heard ‘too old’ disrespect before UFC Kansas City, eyes Korean Zombie next - MMA Fighting
articles.description: Max Holloway wants a fight with a fellow legend for his next outing after a big win at UFC Kansas City.
articles.content:
Max Holloway has heard it all before.
